attributes.action: redesignate Community Service as Community Punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Community Service is a misnomer and merely serves to salve the conscience of the weak and indifferent.
If the court has decided that a punishment is due, then a punishment it should be and it should be recorded as that. The actions of perpetrators of criminal acts cause untold harm to the communities they live in and those communities need reassurance that justice has been served in their name.

By redesignating Community Service as Community Punishment, the repercusions of their actions may be better understood.
